title: Data Scientist Desktop

fields.title: Techniques
fields.value: Predictive Analytics, Decision Making, Data Science

fields.title: Benefits
fields.value: Improve Customer Service, New Service and Capability

body:
## [](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)[](#data-approach)Data Approach

This is an infrastructure as a service, helps NSF data scientists to learn, apply and practice data science using NSF data sets.

## [](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)[](#tools-and-technology)Tools and Technology

The NSF Data Scientist Desktop is an infrastructure for NSF staff to learn, adopt data science methodologies such as R and Python to develop and publish new algorithms that support the NSF mission. This is a virtual machine infrastructure prepacked with a set of R and Python libraries and vitalization tools that are configured to work with NSF data.

## [](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)[](#contact-information)Contact Information

Dorothy Aronson

[daronson@nsf.gov](mailto:daronson@nsf.gov)
